TopicTitle: Problems with Stockalike Station Parts Redux

Articles.Content:
I've been trying to build a space station using the PPD-8 'Wharf' Station Core as the root part. I got all the way to the orbit of Minmus before I realized I couldn't transfer my crew from there. Is this part meant to prevent crew transfer or am I missing something. I also can't EVA from it. What's odd is that the part alone shows two crew hatches but I can't use them. Any help would be appreciated. Sorry if this isn't the correct thread for this type of question.

Edited January 11, 2021 by FrodoSaggins

1 hour ago, FrodoSaggins said:

I've been trying to build a space station using the PPD-8 'Wharf' Station Core as the root part. I got all the way to the orbit of Minmus before I realized I couldn't transfer my crew from there. Is this part meant to prevent crew transfer or am I missing something. I also can't EVA from it. What's odd is that the part alone shows two crew hatches but I can't use them. Any help would be appreciated. Sorry if this isn't the correct thread for this type of question.

You will generally get better traction if you ask in the mod release thread.  That's where most people using/developing the mod are paying attention.
